HeroSection.title: Notably Smarter Notes. Think Better.
HeroSection.subTitle: Supercharge your workflow with Notably â€” the smartest way to capture, organize, and link dev notes, code snippets, and technical insights.

Features.title: Crafted to cover your needs
Features.subTitle: Smart, flexible, and powerful â€” everything you need to build your second brain.

feature1.title: Quick Notes
feature1.description: Capture ideas instantly with lightning-fast input and keyboard-first UX. No friction â€” just flow.

feature2.title: Developer Friendly
feature2.description: Markdown, code blocks, CLI shortcuts, and Git-style versioning. Feels like home.Markdown, code CLI shortcuts, and Git-style versioning. Feels like home

feature3.title: Secure by Design
feature3.description: Your notes are private. Local-first architecture and optional end-to-end encryption mean full control.

CallToAction.title: Take Your Notes to the Next Level
CallToAction.subTitle: Fast, local-first, and built for code. Notes that work the way you think.
